name: Crazy Portal
description:
Equip your portal gun, leverage the magic mechanism of portal and teleportation and defeat your enemies. They will never know how you got’em!

Gameplay:
▲ Remember, portals can only land on the walls.
▲ Aim & Tap to release your portal shot.
▲ Blue portal pulls objects in while yellow portal spits objects out again.
▲ You only have 2 shots (blue and yellow portal), think and use them wisely

Game features:
▲ Sharpen your portal skills through 20 chapters and 320 levels.
▲ Try creating infinite loops just for fun
▲ Timing is particularly important to success
